articles.author: Kishan Vyas
articles.title: Google is restricting which apps can see the other installed apps on your device - XDA Developers
articles.description: Google will be restricting the QUERY_ALL_PACKAGES permission, which is used by Android apps to see which apps are installed on a given device.
articles.content: Google is making some new changes to the Developer Program Policy that will make it harder for apps to see what other apps are installed on your Android device. Google says it regards the full list o… [+2429 chars]
